Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kelly E. Ford
Reviews.Content: Great Camera! Did my research before I bought online, and got a great deal. The micro-SD card was backordered and then I received a full sized SD card instead. The full sized card didn't fit and was returned and my card was credited. The camera is easy to use and takes GREAT pictures! I love the panoramic mode for scenery pics. I would definetely buy from Beach camera again and I am an Olympus fan now too.

Reviews.Title: What I wanted
Reviews.Author: tbar2000
Reviews.Content: This is my third digital camera.  I wanted a very compact camera with good picture quality, ease of use and a good optical zoom.  After two weeks, I am comfortable with this camera and very impressed with the picture quality - even at full 10x zoom or when using flash.  The camera is no bigger than my previous 3x zoom and the viewing screen is brighter.  The image stabilization really works.  I got what I wanted!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: evilsiskc
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera and easy to use.  I have always had a problem with clear pictures - they are usually blurry.  With the shake stablizer on this camera my pix turn out great.  I bought a bundle with a case and lots of handy extras.  It was a great deal.  I'm am very pleased.  The only hitch was that the bundle didn't include a microSD card adapter with the microSD card.  This adaptor makes it easy to take your camera to places like Walgreens to get prints of pictures. The little microSD card is way too tiny to fit into the typical reprint computers that are available.

Reviews.Title: Kit Costs You Money
Reviews.Author: Michaelquerty
Reviews.Content: Do Not Buy this kit. It is horrible. It includes a Case that the camera will not properly fit into and snap correctly. It includes a memory card that will not fit in the Camera properly, (too long), whatever form factor the ADAPTER is to make the tiny memory card fit is wrong. Besides that, you get some universal clear plastic to put on screen, an extra battery (I suppose it will work, I haven't tried it yet), and a card reader. So you will have to purchase the proper memory card and case for the camera after you receive this "package" in.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Evita
Reviews.Content: This was a great camera. The picture quality is really good most of the time. Sometimes the quality isn't great but that I've attributed to user error simply because I'm not the best photographer and I still have trouble figuring out which settings to use for which situations. Other than that I love the fact that the batteries are rechargable and we can plug it into our car. This was definately the best price around too. The speed is ok not the best I'm sure. Especially since I have small children that can't sit still for a second I sometimes do miss those one of a kind moments but since I can't spend several hundred dollars on a camera this was the next best thing.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - incorrect memory card
Reviews.Author: IRISHKML "myyanks"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera - got it for my sister at Christmas who had an accident and didn't open it until a couple months after Christmas.  I ordered the kit which included the memory card. However, it had the incorrect memory card - I contacted them and they very nicely sent another one which was also wrong.  I don't understand if this company sells the product why they can't send the correct memeory card.  Customer service is pleasant, camera takes great pictures but I wish I had gotten the memory card that I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna R. Grant
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.  It is the 2nd Olympus in the family, and both are wonderful.  This Olympus has many more functions than the camera it is replacing.  A great camera at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus-9000 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Zeeb
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for travel.  Easy to use and the picture quality is outstanding.  Easy to transfer pics to a computer.  Beech Camera is a great place to buy, quick response and camera received with all accessories just as advertised.  I highly recommend the rapid battery charger and the 1400mAH battery.

Reviews.Title: It's good camera
Reviews.Author: SaYumi
Reviews.Content: I like this camera for the price.I paid $189 with memory card,camera case, extra battery, multi card reader,cleaner and scrren protecter.But I wish the camera could be more thinner and take HD video.It' takes great picture and good to have 10X Zoom.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy this for the KIT
Reviews.Author: praneeth thoutam
Reviews.Content: My package just arrived, and I was expecting all those extras to be decent, but thats pretty cheap made in china stuff not even worth 10$.Specially I was expecting that memory card to be xD, which is compatible with this camera, but instead I received an SD card, I dont know which company that card belongs to, the camera bag I am throwing it out, coming to the camera, yes its pretty decent, buy/get this deal for the camera but not for the complete kit.  Now I got to shop and wait for my card to arrive. No pics for this weekend. They should have atleast mentioned it, in the list of products that this is an SD card, not xD card for this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and nice pictures.  Have enjoyed this camera very much.  Don't forget, you will need to purchase your own storage card.

Reviews.Title: Stylus 9000 camera < Amazon
Reviews.Author: evanne kennedy
Reviews.Content: Took my new Stylus to Ireland for 5 weeks. It worked o.k., took nice pictures, and gave no trouble. It's somewhat clunky in size and weight, but seems to have a lot of function built in to it. In fact, this is the most complicated camera I have ever used. The manual is helpful and I am still perusing it. All in all, I would recommend the STylus 9000 if you are willing to work with it, and RTFM.Jim KennedyOlympus Stylus 9000 12 MP Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle Optical Dual Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: This camera takes fantastic pictures! It is the BEST camera I've owned.  Get it you won't be sorry!

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus 9000, bundle from Beach Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Stivelberg
Reviews.Content: I bought it in black color. From my research I wanted this camera and wasn't available here except online from Olympus. The bundle was so convenient: I got all the accesories for the price I'd had paid for the camera only! I received it in a few days, everything was perfect, and I love the camera. It's easy to use, and it takes great pictures. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Camara Olympus
Reviews.Author: Mildred
Reviews.Content: El producto es muy bueno aunque un poco complicado.El libro no explica claramente para que es cada funcion y no explica claramente cuando hay problemas.

Reviews.Title: TAKES VERY NICE PICS
Reviews.Author: R. Willette
Reviews.Content: I WAS LOOKING FOR A CAMERA THAT I COULD CARRY AROUND EVERYDAY.  THIS ONE IS SMALL ENOUGH TO DO THAT AND TAKES SOME OF THE BEST PICTURES I'VE SEEN.  WELL WORTH BUYING.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: B. Fuhrmann
Reviews.Content: This is a Great Camera. Purchased this one for a gift! Mine is just like this except that it is the black model. Takes beautiful pictures, each to use, and fits in your pocket. Took it along on our last vacation people who have seen our photos can't hardly believe the great quality this little camera took. Now I ONLY use this camera when taking photos!

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: S. Kiran "kiran samasandrapalya"
Reviews.Content: i sent this camera to my brother in law in india who has been using this camera under close up shots. like the quality and portability

Reviews.Title: Assembly required
Reviews.Author: Stevie851 "Stevie98119"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera in little pieces.  At no time on the product description was it ever explained to me that I would have to assemble the silly thing right down to the straps.  I would not have purchased it had I known that.  I would have gone to a camera store.  I'm very disappointed in Amazon for this.Also, Amazon needs to counsel it's selling partners about green packaging.  Most of the components in this mess were bound in that very hard clear plastic that requires cutting with kitchen shears or better and will survive nuclear blasts along with outliving cockroaches.  Nice green plan Amazon!I will not purchase another electronic item from Amazon.  This is TOO much bloody work!N Stephens
